__e: You will see that court-martial is the way to go.
Martial law has been enforced now for three hours... but it hasn't stemmed what is obviously--
And I respectfully suggest the purpose of this court-martial is to seek justice, not protect Commander Burke.
Now I'll be court-martialed because of him...
If a court-martial is the only way to let the people of the Federation know what is happening here, I welcome it.
I don't want nobody risking a court-martial for me.
